method.text: Place onion on a non-stick baking tray. Top with the fish. Season. Pour over the wine. Cover with foil. Cook in the oven for 8-10 min until fish is just cooked.
Remove fish. Lightly flake. Mix the fish in with the mashed potato and parsley in a bowl.
Pour the fish liquor and onion into a pan with the lemon juice. Bring to the boil to reduce by half. Mix into the fish and potato mixture.
With lightly floured hands, divide the mixture into 12-16 balls. Dip into the egg and then the breadcrumbs.
Heat the oil in a deep saucepan to 190°C Deep fry the fish cakes for 5-6 min or until pale golden brown. Drain on kitchen paper before serving.
